column4: Hi, I need an inexpensive RAID controller and do not know if this one (ADAPTEC
RAID 1220SA SINGLE) si compatible or not with latest version of ubuntu server x64
I went to ubuntu hcl but all I find for Adaptec is this: Adaptec AAC-RAID
I cant say if that partiticular raid card is supported, but some adaptec cards are not supported well at all. I would suggest a used 3ware raid card from ebay
